feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Women’s History Month: A Conversation with Patty Wagstaff
entry.summary: You can’t talk about aerobatic flying without talking about Patty Wagstaff: a 3-time US National Aerobatic Champion; a 6-time members of the US Aerobatic Team; a gold, silver, and bronze medal winner in the International Aerobatic Competition; an inductee in the National Aviation Hall of Fame; and the first woman to win the title of … Continued

entry.title: Expert Series I: ATR 42-600 / 72-600
entry.summary: Microsoft Flight Simulator today released the first entry into a brand-new series of highly authentic and accurate aircraft called “Expert Series”. The ATR 42-600 and ATR 72-600 are being released together in this bundle and will provide an incredible and authentic aviation experience. ATR, short for “Regional Transport Aircraft,” in both French and Italian, was … Continued

entry.title: Community Spotlight: JoeyBolo77
entry.summary: May is celebrated as Asian/Pacific American Heritage Month, and in recognition of the occasion, we are pleased to shine the spotlight on community member JoeyBolo77, a Filipino-American Microsoft Flight Simulator Twitch streamer. We recently caught up with Joey to ask him some questions about his experiences with flight simulation and his involvement in the community.How … Continued

entry.title: May 25th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Testing for Aircraft & Avionics Update 2 (AAU_02) continues to go well. The teams at Asobo and Working Title are hard at work preparing a new beta build which we target for deployment to testers within the next few days.

entry.title: June 1st, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Public testing of Aircraft & Avionics Update 02 (AAU_02) remains ongoing. Earlier this week, we released a new beta build (1.33.6.0) to testers. This build includes several dozen bug fixes and feature improvements.

entry.title: June 8th, 2023 Development Update
entry.summary: Thank you to everyone who has been participating in the public beta test for Aircraft & Avionics Update 02 (AAU_02). Your feedback and bug reports have been incredibly helpful to the development team as we continue preparing for a target launch date of June 23.

entry.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024: The Next Generation of the Legendary Franchise
entry.summary: Pursue your dream of an aviation career with Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. This brand-new simulator is designed to take advantage of the latest technologies in simulation, cloud, machine learning, graphics and gaming to create the most sophisticated, immersive and awe-inspiring flight simulator of all time. To achieve this unprecedented level of accuracy, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is powered by the significantly evolved … Continued

entry.summary: Top questions about the upcoming Microsoft Flight Simulator sequel.
